Hi,

I'm quite new to JUnit. I'm having to give a presentation of JUnit in
=
more than a week. The focus is the new features in version 4.
Nevertheless,=
 I think I will want to have 1 - 3 beginning slides
briefly introducing the=
 tool which consist of the following information:

- General Introduction.
=
- Historical, current and (possibly) future development.

Could anyone poin=
t me some source for the second point? (how, when, on
what circumstance the=
 tool originated? How has it evolved so far?
What's the current state? What=
's the big roadmap picture? Its plan for
future development? Which future d=
irection would it take? What are the
most critical features that will proba=
bly be added (or needed) in the
next release?...). Answers to such question=
s would be highly appreciated.

Thanks,
David.
